rows.label: qst501905_msg0001
rows.name: My Nopon Chess Set broke...

rows.label: qst501905_msg0002
rows.name:
I found it on the street, so it's not like
it was in perfect shape to begin with,
but it's proper ruined now.

rows.label: qst501905_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, I guess we got a lot of use out
of it, for something we got for free.

rows.label: qst501905_msg0004
rows.name:
Now, I'm not gonna let this get me
down, you know. I'll just enjoy myself
fishing instead.

rows.label: qst501905_msg0005
rows.name:
But my pal I always played it with?
He's getting pretty depressed.

rows.label: qst501905_msg0006
rows.name:
So I figure, I'd better catch a big one,
and hope it cheers my friend right up!

rows.label: qst501905_msg0007
rows.name: Hang on, is that...?!

rows.label: qst501905_msg0008
rows.name:
That's a Nopon Chess Set!
And made of coral, even!

rows.label: qst501905_msg0009
rows.name:
Wow, I'm really jealous...
Those only came out just recently!

rows.label: qst501905_msg0010
rows.name: Give him the Coral Nopon Chess Set?

rows.label: qst501905_msg0011
rows.name: Yes

rows.label: qst501905_msg0012
rows.name: No

rows.label: qst501905_msg0013
rows.name: Really?! I can have it?!

rows.label: qst501905_msg0014
rows.name: Wow, thanks!

rows.label: qst501905_msg0015
rows.name:
My dad's a soldier, so he never
comes home lately.

rows.label: qst501905_msg0016
rows.name:
And my mom won't give me any
pocket money, 'cos she wants to
save up cash in case war breaks out.

rows.label: qst501905_msg0017
rows.name:
And I mean, we live on Torika Alley,
so we were never exactly well off
to begin with...

rows.label: qst501905_msg0018
rows.name:
Seriously, thanks for this!
Me and my pal will treasure it forever!

rows.label: qst501905_msg0019
rows.name:
Ohhhhh... What I wouldn't
give for one of those!

rows.label: qst501905_msg0020
rows.name:
One day, I'm gonna get stinking rich
and buy a Coral Nopon Chess Set
of my very own!
